subtitle: Build your crypto empire! Mine, upgrade, and become a blockchain tycoon!
heroText: Build your blockchain empire, mine BTC, and grow your passive income! Start with just an old PC and climb to the top of the crypto world.

features.title: True Offline Earnings
features.description: Your empire keeps mining while you're away. Collect profits when you return and extend your offline time with boosts.

features.title: Progression & Prestige
features.description: Reset your progress to buy permanent multipliers. Unlock bigger profits, faster rigs, cheaper upgrades, and boosted delivery bonuses.

features.title: Strategic Automation
features.description: Purchase scripts to fully automate production. Upgrade from basic CPUs to powerful ASICs and the legendary QUANTUM MINER.

features.title: Dynamic Gameplay
features.description: Face hacker attacks, open mystery crates, complete missions, and discover random events that keep every session fresh.

features.title: Fair Free-to-Play
features.description: The entire game is playable without spending. Optional ads and IAPs available for players who want to accelerate progress.

features.title: Cloud Save
features.description: Your progress is always safe with cloud saving. Enjoy regular updates with new content, features, and balance changes.

whyPlayItems: Deep Idle Progression: Thousands of upgrade combinations and powerful prestige upgrades
Fast Satisfaction: Immediate upgrades plus long-term strategy for maximum growth
Dynamic Variety: Random events, minigames, and quick missions keep every session interesting
For Everyone: Simple to learn for casual players, with deep strategy for crypto fans to master
ctaText: Download and start mining your way to billionaire status. Compete with your own high scores, optimize your automation, and become the ultimate Idle Crypto Tycoon!
